name: After Reset RPG
blurb: After Reset RPG is a sci-fi post-apocalyptic role-playing game. Inspired by original Fallout 1/2, Baldur's Gate and Planescape:Torment.

rewards.reward: NONAME ============================== \u2022 Digital downloadable copy of After Reset RPG for PC, MAC OSX, or Linux. This low price is only available for those who help fund. \u2022 In-game access to Quanton Sync, which allows your actions, your choices affect the setting globally even beyond the game. \u2022 Digital Advanced Player's Guide in best traditions of old school RPG.

NONAME #2 ============================== \u2022 Digital downloadable copy of After Reset RPG for PC, MAC OSX, or Linux. This low price is only available for those who help fund. \u2022 In-game access to Quanton Sync, which allows your actions, your choices affect the setting globally even beyond the game. \u2022 Digital Advanced Player's Guide in best traditions of old school RPG.

PRIVATE
==============================  • Digital downloadable copy of After Reset RPG for PC, MAC OSX, or Linux. This low price is only available for those who help fund. 
• In-game access to Quanton Sync, which allows your actions, your choices affect the setting globally even beyond the game.
• Digital Advanced Player's Guide in best traditions of old school RPG.

PRIVATE FIRST CLASS
============================== Includes all PRIVATE rewards plus more:
• Exclusive full HD backers' promo arts collection "Who will you become after the end of days?"
• Unique title 'Co-Founder' with access to the Official After Reset Community, where backers can will be polled on specific game development decisions.

SPECIALIST\r\n============================== Includes all PRIVATE FIRST CLASS rewards plus more:\r\n\u2022 Digital download of graphic novella "The Fall of Gyes", which will tell a backstory of military bunker you are waking up in the original game. This low price is only available for those who help fund.

CORPORAL\r\n============================== Includes all SPECIALIST rewards plus more:\r\n\u2022 Digital After Reset OST of the best post-apocalyptic ambience. This low price is only available for those who help fund.

2X PRIVATE ============================== \u2022 2 Digital downloadable copoes of After Reset RPG for PC, MAC OSX, or Linux. This low price is only available for those who help fund. \u2022 In-game access to Quanton Sync for each copy, which allows your actions, your choices affect the setting globally even beyond the game. \u2022 2 Digital Advanced Player's Guides in best traditions of old school RPG.
SERGEANT\r\n============================== Includes all CORPORAL rewards plus more:\r\n\u2022 Advanced access to all concept arts in full HD.

SERGEANT [+] ============================== Includes all CORPORAL rewards plus more: \u2022 Boxed copies of After Reset RPG and Official Soundtrack for PC, MAC OSX, or Linux. \u2022 In-game access to Quanton Sync, which allows your actions, your choices affect the setting globally even beyond the game. \u2022 Digital Advanced Player's Guide in best traditions of old school RPG.\u2022 Advanced access to all concept arts in full HD.

STAFF SERGEANT
============================== Includes all SERGEANT rewards plus more:
• You'll also receive Closed Beta Test Access where you can experience After Reset before it is released to the public. 
• Co-Funder's Luck: 3 extra random encounters to be found in the game.
• In-game access to exclusive MARPCO Prototype Cyber Dog, which you will able to assemble so that it accompany you during your adventures.

SERGEANT FIRST CLASS
============================== Includes all SERGEANT rewards plus more:
• Boxed copies of After Reset RPG and Official Soundtrack for PC, MAC OSX, or Linux.
• You'll also receive Closed Beta Test Access where you can experience After Reset before it is released to the public. 
• Co-Funder's Luck: 3 extra random encounters to be found in the game.
• In-game access to exclusive MARPCO Prototype Cyber Dog, which you will able to assemble so that it accompany you during your adventures.

MASTER SERGEANT
============================== Includes all STAFF SERGEANT rewards plus more:
• Standard version of After Reset RPG is swapped for DIRECTOR’S CUT version (no violence/morale/language restrictions switcher) for PC, MAC OSX, or Linux. 
• You'll also receive Early Alpha Test Access where you can experience After Reset before it is released to the public.
• 'One Per Five' Sync Feat (your actions, your choices affect the setting globally via Quanton Sync as of five ordinary players).

FIRST SERGEANT\r\n============================== Includes all MASTER SERGEANT rewards plus more: \u2022 Boxed After Reset RPG DIRECTOR\u2019S CUT version (no violence/morale/language restrictions switcher) and Official Soundtrack for PC, MAC OSX, or Linux.

FIRST SERGEANT [+] ============================== Includes all MASTER SERGEANT rewards plus more: \u2022 Boxed After Reset RPG DIRECTOR\u2019S CUT version (no violence/morale/language restrictions switcher) and Official Soundtrack for PC, MAC OSX, or Linux.\u2022 \u201cWailing Wall\u201d feature allowing us to put baker\u2019s name to the in-game memorial in Reno city, dedicated to survivors died during the Dallas Incident.

SERGEANT MAJOR [+] ============================== Includes all MASTER SERGEANT rewards plus more: \u2022 'One Per Ten' Quanton Feat: your actions, your choices affect the setting globally via Quanton Sync as of ten ordinary players. \u2022 Printed Advanced Player's Guide in best traditions of old school RPG. \u2022 \u201cName a weapon\u201d feature allowing us to name a weapon by your name.

SERGEANT MAJOR OF THE UGMC  ============================== Includes all SERGEANT MAJOR rewards plus more:\r\n\u2022 Printed graphic novella "The Fall of Gyes", which will tell a backstory of military bunker you are waking up in the original game. \r\n\u2022 Printed Concept Art Book with the best concept arts of the After Reset RPG.

SECOND LIEUTENANT
============================== Includes all SERGEANT MAJOR OF THE UGMC rewards plus more:
• Boxed DIRECTOR’S CUT version of the game is signed by R.Nixon and developers team.
• At this level, we include you in the credits along with the development team.
